verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During his presidential campaign] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he was opposed to illegal immigration , not legal immigration] . Yet his administration has found ways to prevent or remove hundreds of thousands of legal immigrants from the United States .
